author: Staff Reporter
text: The 3{+r}{+d}edition of Child Rights and You (CRY) Soccer for Child Rights will be held on 20 February at YMCA Grounds, Nandanam. The event, sponsored by Sankara Infrastructure and supported by The Hindu will have teams from the corporates and Slum Children Sports Talent Education Development Society.
title: CRY Soccer at Chennai YMCA
